title: Viet Hung Nguyen Cao
text: Viet-Hung Nguyen-Cao is a PhD candidate at the Graduate School of Political Science, Waseda University. I study International Relations with a focus on international security, using survey experiments and text analysis. My current research interests include territorial disputes, public opinions and authoritarian politics.
